trans-unit.source: Abstract class that, when implemented, defines an animation segment with its own target value and interpolation method for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个抽象类，该类在实现后可以用它自己的目标值和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeAnimationUsingKeyFrames" /> 的内插方法来定义一个动画段。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> class that has the specified target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定目标 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" /> of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 实例的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> class that has the specified target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定目标 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值（包含 0.0 和 1.0），该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Returns the interpolated value of a specific key frame at the progress increment provided.
trans-unit.target: 返回特定关键帧在提供的进度增量处的内插值。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。

trans-unit.source: The base value is typically the initial value of the property being animated or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A> of the previous key frame.
trans-unit.target: 基础值通常是正在进行动画处理的属性的初始值或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BooleanKeyFrame.Value%2A>的上一个关键帧。

trans-unit.source: Most implementations will return the value of `baseValue` when `keyFrameProgress` is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 大多数实施方案将返回的值`baseValue`时`keyFrameProgress`为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <paramref name="keyFrameProgress" /> is not between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 当 <paramref name="keyFrameProgress" /> 不在 0.0 和 1.0 之间（包括两端）时发生。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from; typically the value of the previous key frame.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值；通常为上一个关键帧的值。

trans-unit.source: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0.0 和 1.0 之间的值（包含 0.0 和 1.0），该值指定此关键帧已经过去的时间的百分比。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the value of a key frame at the progress increment provided.
trans-unit.target: 在提供的进度增量处，计算一个关键帧的值。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 给定了指定基值和进度时此关键帧的输出值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time at which the key frame's target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置应到达关键帧的目标 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> 的时间。

trans-unit.source: The time at which the key frame's current value should be equal to its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的当前值所在的时间应等于它的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime.Uniform" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 实例关联的值。

trans-unit.source: The current value for this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the key frame's target value.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: The key frame's target value, which is the value of this key frame at its specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的目标值，这是此关键帧在其指定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.KeyTime" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SizeKeyFrame.Value" /> 依赖项属性。
